archimate:Requirement.name: Re-use existing systems
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Excel, Sharepoint list, Archer? Current top option is Sharepoint Lists We have a requirement to use existing solutions to fill the goal to be cost-efficent, likewise this addresses the architecture principles Optimized TCO and Clarity and Simplicity. Re-using existing systems also adheres to Defense in depth, as well as Usability and Manageability by minimizing complexity.
